verses:
When upon life billows you are tempted tossed
When you are discouraged thinking all is gone
Count your many blessing name them one by one
And it will surprise you what the Lord has done.

When you look it others wfth th ir ands and gold

Count your many blessings wealth can never buy
Your reward in heaven nor your home on 
high.

So amid the conflict whether great or small
Do not be disheartened God is over al
Count your many blessings angels will attend
Help and comfort give you till your journey's end
